operation.command: update BGEN.CIVILP set ETANP = 'ASSURES DIVERS CAFAT test', ETAPRE = 'test' where ETACAF = '01900000000001'

select 1 from sgencli.cli_personne_physique pp inner join sgencli.cli_client c on pp.id_fk_client = c.id where c.histo_numero = '01900000000001' and pp.nom_patronymique = 'ASSURES DIVERS CAFAT test' and pp.prenoms = 'test'
update BGEN.CIVILP set ETANP = 'ASSURES DIVERS CAFAT', ETAPRE = '.' where ETACAF = '01900000000001'
